description: Takes in a list of profile outbound requests to be placed as part of an outbound campaign. This API is idempotent.

parameters.name: profileOutboundRequests
parameters.description: List of profile outbound requests (dict) --- Information about a profile outbound request Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request. Identifier of the customer profile expirationTime (datetime) --- Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone.

nested_params.name: clientToken
nested_params.description: Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request.

nested_params.name: expirationTime
nested_params.description: Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone.

nested_items.name: successfulRequests
nested_items.description: List of successful profile outbound requests.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: Identifier of the profile outbound request.

nested_items.name: failedRequests
nested_items.description: List of failed profile outbound requests.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: Identifier of the profile outbound request.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: Predefined code indicating the error that caused the failure.
